page.title: 10POPULATION OF PLAINS VILLAGE
page.content: ACCORDING TO THE 1981 CENSUS, PLAINS, THE LARGEST VILLAGE IN THE BLOCK, HAD A TOTAL POPULATION OF 3203, OF WHICH 1560 WERE MALE AND 1643 FEMALE. {1089 {OR 34% OF THE TOTAL POPULATION WERE {UNDER 16 YEARS OF AGE.}THE LARGEST GROUP OF THE DEPENDENT POPULATION WAS IN THE AGE-GROUP 10-14 WITH A TOTAL OF 398. THE WORKING POPULATION i.e.16 TO 65 YEARS OF AGE TOTALLED 1913 OR NEARLY 60% OF THE TOTAL POPULATION. { {THE LARGEST SINGLE GROUP IN THE {WORKING POPULATION WAS IN THE 20-24 {AGE GROUP}WITH A TOTAL OF 316. ABOUT 200 PEOPLE OR ROUGHLY 6% OF THE POPULATION WAS OVER RETIREMENT AGE { {WITH FEMALES ENJOYING A LONGER LIFE {SPAN}- THERE WERE 34 FEMALES OVER 80 YEARS OF AGE COMPARED WITH ONLY 7 MALES.
